update pub_patients
pat_card_num = #{patCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_name = #{patName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_sex = #{patSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
pat_birthday = #{patBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fee_id = #{feeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fee_name = #{feeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nature_id = #{natureId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
nature_name = #{natureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nature_type = #{natureType,jdbcType=CHAR},
pat_identity_num = #{patIdentityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_certifi_type = #{patCertifiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_certifi_num = #{patCertifiNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_fam_address = #{patFamAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_postcode = #{patPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_contact_phone = #{patContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_contacts = #{patContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_phone = #{patPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_work_unit = #{patWorkUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pat_operation = #{patOperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pat_his_allergic = #{patHisAllergic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pat_mem_grade = #{patMemGrade,jdbcType=CHAR},
platfrom_id = #{platfromId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
personal_no = #{personalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicare_card = #{medicareCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
special_disease_sign = #{specialDiseaseSign,jdbcType=CHAR},
stipulate_disease_code = #{stipulateDiseaseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stipulate_disease_name = #{stipulateDiseaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stipulate_disease_record_no = #{stipulateDiseaseRecordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
med_pat_out = #{medPatOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
med_card_info = #{medCardInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

current_year_balance = #{currentYearBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
calendar_year_balance = #{calendarYearBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
blacklist_reasons = #{blacklistReasons,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
